content.description:
The crux comes low trying to move past the big obvious ledge.  Find the left-hand mono pocket, throw the high heel hook and rock up to easier holds. 

  Very fun climb to do once but wouldn't want to repeat it?  Hurts my finger
content.protection: Top rope only as per MW usual
content.location: The left-most route on the backside of main canyon.

content.description: Large overhanging roof with a few different variations 5.?
content.location:
Routes are in the backside of the main canyon.  

  Map: 

mountainproject.com/images/…

  Routes: 

mountainproject.com/images/…

content.description: This is the other 5.11 route that starts using the obvious big ledge for handholds on the left end of backside of main canyon.  It is the next route right of Vacation.  The crux is at the beginning and only two or three moves.
content.location: The second route from the left on backside of main canyon, just right of Vacation.

content.description: The wall on the West side of the main canyon is actually part of a big free standing boulder/tower.  On the back side of this boulder are a handful of overhung 5.10 - 5.11 routes and a few easier problems.
